import './profileUpdate.css'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {isLength, isMatch} from './validation' import {showSuccessMsg, showErrMsg} from '../Notification' import {fetchUser} from '../../redux/action/authAction' const initialState = { name: '', email: '', password: '', cf_password: '', err: '', success: '' } function Profile(){ const[userData , setUserData] = useState(null); useEffect(()=> { const token = sessionStorage.getItem('token') async function getUser() { const userdata =await fetchUser(token); console.log("asasas" , userdata); setUserData(userdata.data) } getUser(); console.log("uD" , userData); }, []) const onFormSubmit = async (e) => { try { const res = await axios.post('/user/update', { email, password }) } catch (err) { err.response.data.msg; } } return (
email
{userData?.email}
Profile Update
) } export default Profile
